whatIsService.title: What Is Tattoo Removal?
whatIsService.content:
Tattoo removal is a specialised treatment that uses laser technology to break down tattoo pigments in the skin. Over multiple sessions, the body naturally eliminates these tiny ink particles, gradually fading the tattoo.

At The Skin Firm, we use USFDA-approved Q-switched and Pico laser technology that specifically targets ink pigments without harming the surrounding skin. Whether it’s a name, design, or professional tattoo you no longer want, our treatments help restore clear skin safely and effectively.

faqs.title: FAQs on Tattoo Removal in Pune

questions.question: How many sessions are required to remove a tattoo?
questions.answer: Most tattoos need 6-10 sessions, depending on size, depth, and colour.

questions.question: Is tattoo removal painful?
questions.answer: Mild discomfort similar to a rubber band snap may be felt, but numbing creams make it very tolerable.

questions.question: Can coloured tattoos be removed?
questions.answer: Yes, but colours like green and blue may need more sessions compared to black or red tattoos.

questions.question: Will there be scars after tattoo removal?
questions.answer: When done with advanced lasers and proper aftercare, the risk of scarring is minimal.

questions.question: How long does Tattoo Removal session take?
questions.answer: Small tattoos may take 15 minutes, while larger ones may require 45-60 minutes.

questions.question: Can all tattoos be completely removed?
questions.answer: Most tattoos fade significantly, but results depend on pigment depth and colour. Some may lighten fully, while others may leave a faint shadow.

questions.question: Is tattoo removal safe for dark skin tones?
questions.answer: Yes, at The Skin Firm, we use safe protocols tailored for every skin tone.

questions.question: How soon can I see results from my Tattoo Removal treatment?
questions.answer: Fading is visible after 2-3 sessions, with progressive lightening over time.

questions.question: Can I get a cover-up tattoo after removal?
questions.answer: Yes, many patients lighten an old tattoo before covering it with a new design.

questions.question: How much gap is needed between sessions?
questions.answer: Sessions are spaced 6-8 weeks apart to allow proper skin healing.
